title: RANKED IMPORTANT
body: I think its fair that if someone is afk in your game you should get a loss prevented or a no lp loss cause theyre are so many stories of people being stuck in low elo cause afkers are losing there promos or costing them precious lp.  Admittedly i am stuck in low elo and i do encounter alot of afkers some are on the other team and no its not fair that they have to lose a game they couldve won a 5v5 with. i think this is something that needs to be addressed not just in low elos but also in higher elos.

replies.body:
hey guys i dont think we can win ill go afk and we wont lose any lp. it could easily be abused

just dont give up as you might just win

Nope no loss prevented. We have been over this for years...
Simple solution is to give 'Lost prevention of choice' like 'ip win per day bonus' so player can have the option to revert a lost. That can happen once in 10 games etc.
